info.title: Sales Contract
info.description:
There are two main types of sales contracts. A quantity
contract is an agreement between company and customer for
the customer to purchase a specific quantity of a material
at a certain price within a specific time period. A value
contract is an agreement between a company and customer that
contains the materials and services the customer will
receive within a specific time period, up to a specific
value.

x-sap-shortText:
There are two main types of sales contracts. A quantity
contract is an agreement between company and customer for
the customer to purchase a specific quantity of a material
at a certain price within a specific time period. A value
contract is an agreement between a company and customer that
contains the materials and services the customer will
receive within a specific time period, up to a specific
value.

contains the materials and services the customer will
receive within a specific time period, up to a specific
value.

sap.graph.SalesContract.title: SalesContract

createdAt.description: Date and time the entity was created.

changedAt.description: Date and time the entity was changed last.

displayId.description: A unique identifier that represents a product.

contractType.description: A code that represents the type of the sales contract.

soldToParty.description:
The customer who orders the goods or services. The sold-to
party is contractually responsible for sales orders.

_soldToParty.description:
The customer who orders the goods or services. The sold-to
party is contractually responsible for sales orders.

soldToPartyPurchaseOrderId.description:
Number that the customer uses to uniquely identify a
purchasing document.

validFrom.description: The date from which the sales contract is valid.

validTo.description: Date Until which the sales contract is valid.

signedOn.description: Date on which Contract Is Signed.

salesOrganization.description:
An organizational unit responsible for the sale of certain
products or services.

distributionChannel.description:
A channel through which products or services reach
customers.

_distributionChannel.description:
A channel through which products or services reach
customers.

division.description: A way of grouping materials, products, or services.

_division.description: A way of grouping materials, products, or services.

salesOffice.description:
A physical location (for example, a branch office) that has
responsibility for the sale of certain products or services
within a given geographical area.

salesGroup.description:
A group of sales people who are responsible for processing
sales of certain products or services.

documentCurrency.description: Currency that applies to the sales contract.

_documentCurrency.description: Currency that applies to the sales contract.

netAmount.description: Net Value of the Sales Contract in Net Amount Currency.

pricingDate.description: Date for Pricing and Exchange Rate

incotermsClassification.description:
Commonly used trading terms that comply with the standards
established by the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC).

_incotermsClassification.description:
Commonly used trading terms that comply with the standards
established by the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC).

incotermsLocation.description: Additional information for the primary Incoterm.

approvalStatus.description:
States whether a sales document is relevant for approvals
and, if so, which approval stage it is in.

processingStatus.description: The processing status of the entire sales document.

parties.description: Partners related to the sales contract.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of sales contract.

requestBody.description:
There are two main types of sales contracts. A quantity
contract is an agreement between company and customer for
the customer to purchase a specific quantity of a material
at a certain price within a specific time period. A value
contract is an agreement between a company and customer that
contains the materials and services the customer will
receive within a specific time period, up to a specific
value.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET BudgetPeriod HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
